prerequisite: Any divine class, must worship the Raven Queen
name: Soul Reaper
text: Death is the natural course for all things, from the lowly insect to the mightiest of gods. It is not an end, of course, but a beginningâ€”the first step onto the road into the unknown. For you, death offers little fear or concern because you are confident that the Raven Queen will shepherd you to whatever fate your long service has earned. This comfort and understanding forms the cornerstone of your beliefs, and you carry this message wherever you go, consoling the grieving or speeding those who deserve to meet the Raven Queen on their way.

features.disruptingAttack(11thLevel): You ignore necrotic resistance with your divine attack powers
features.harvestingAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action on a turn in which you reduced a non-minion enemy to 0 hit points, you can also move your speed as a free action
features.drawnToDeath(16thLevel): Whenever a creature within 5 squares of you reduces another creature to 0 hit points or fewer, you can shift 2 squares toward the triggering creature

flavorText: Fear not death, my friend, for the Raven Queen is glad to meet you on the other side.
